title: QUIVER: A Billionaire Stepbrother With Benefits Romance
description: I can't stop thinking about him.How dare he embarrass me like that.He's a stupid, arrogant, egotistical jerk.But every time I think about him I start to QUIVER.He's everything I hate in a man.He is destroying my company.He treats women like tissue paper.I want him to shoot that arrow straight into my.....Now he's my stepbrother. I'm engaged.I shouldn't be thinking of him this way.But I can't forget his hand between my legs....
author: Cynthia Sharon
